entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY AND MUCH COOLER
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF RAIN AND DRIZZLE AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

RAIN LIKELY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
RAIN, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE LOWER 50S IN THE AFTERNOON
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON

LOWS IN THE MID 30S

PARTLY SUNNY

RAIN

NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

PARTLY SUNNY
